biotools.summary: Discover novel protein motifs (SLiMs, mORFs, miniMotifs) and PTM sites. Analyses proteomes for regions with significant similarity to a specificity determinant model built from a set of aligned functional peptides.

bioschemas.name: PSSMSearch
bioschemas.summary: Discover novel protein motifs (SLiMs, mORFs, miniMotifs) and PTM sites. Analyses proteomes for regions with significant similarity to a specificity determinant model built from a set of aligned functional peptides.
